sentences.sentence: He had never let a foreman see him slacking.
sentences.translation: 他从未让工头见到他偷懒过。

sentences.sentence: I was working as a foreman on a building site.
sentences.translation: 我在一个建筑工地当工头。

sentences.sentence: He still visited the dairy daily, but left most of the business details to his manager and foreman.
sentences.translation: 他仍然每天去牛奶公司，但将多数生意上的细节留给了经理和工头。
